title: Simpsons Tapped Out 4.4.0 Hack [Unlimited Donuts, Money, XP,Tick
description:
Simpsons Tapped Out 4.4.0 Hack [Unlimited Donuts, Money, XP,Tickets, Old Items].
You must login and be level 15 (at least).
Add me: jolanu418
___________________________________________________________________________________
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
1.Install v0: normal version and let it update(login);
2.Install v1b: it has the money,XP,donuts,tickets;old items;
3.Play.
___________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________

If you are having problems with Krustyland stuff in Sprinfield and want the hack(or not) do this:

1.Install v0: normal version and let it update(login);
2.Install vKLFix: Now you can sell the items from Krustyland;
3.Install v1b over it: it has the money,XP,donuts,tickets;old items;
4.Play.
___________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________

If you have problems from going back to 4.3.0 there's nothing to do, but if it crashes or doesn't work make sure 
you are at least 15(yes, you have to login) and install v1:

1.Install v0: normal version and let it update(login);
2.Install v1: it has the money,XP,donuts,tickets,old items;
3.It should work;
4.Play.
___________________________________________________________________________________
___________________________________________________________________________________

Stuff that you unlock:

Good Stuff:
 
Cletus's Farm has 4 new options:
$100,000;
10,000 XP;
500 Donuts;
5000 Krustyland Tickets.
 
Squidport Entrance:
1 Free Instant Boardwalk Tile;
5 Free Instant Boardwalk Tiles;
10 Free Instant Boardwalk Tiles;
25 Free Instant Boardwalk Tiles;

Not so Good and Old Stuff:

One Intro Quest;
Seven Part Questline;
Four Custom Jobs;
One Custom Building;
Added original Lamp Post back to the buy menu.
